definition: tone of voice/the way one speaks/manner of expression/tone
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
one breath/in one breath/at a stretch
to heave a sigh of relief
erhua variant of 一口氣|一口气[yi1 kou3 qi4]
not to be crushed (idiom)/to be determined to have one's revenge
pinyin: bu4 zheng1 man2 tou5 zheng1 kou3 qi4

definition: to gasp (in surprise, dismay, fright etc)
to take one's revenge/to score off sb
to sound out opinions/to get sb's views by polite or indirect questioning/also written 探口風|探口风[tan4 kou3 feng1]
to heave a sigh of relief

sentences.english: I wolfed the whole two pounds of bread without stopping to take breath.
sentences.chinese: 我狼吞虎咽地一口气把整整两磅面包干掉了。

sentences.english: She brought up the water, stopping at each landing to get her breath.
sentences.chinese: 她提水上楼，在每个楼梯平台处停下来喘口气。

sentences.english: They've had their revenge more or less.

sentences.chinese: 深吸一口气，现在呼出来，再来一遍。

sentences.english: Some people say women can't do this job, but we'll show them.
sentences.chinese: 有人说妇女干不了这种工作，我们要争这口气。
他吸了一口气，强自镇定。

sentences.english: So I took a deep breath and worked on the last nail.
sentences.chinese: 我深深地吸了口气，去拔最后一根钉子。

sentences.english: Take a deep breath and feel the beauty of language with heart. Look, you can do it!
sentences.chinese: 深呼一口气，用心感受语言的美妙，瞧，你也能行。

sentences.english: Ralph, Jr. plops down on couch and sighs with satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 小拉尔夫扑通一声坐在沙发椅上，满意地叹了口气。

sentences.english: The place to see son has red flag finally relieved.
sentences.chinese: 见儿子有了去处，文红旗终于松了口气。

sentences.english: He took a breath to clear away the cobwebs of the night as the raven flapped away.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了口气吹走昨夜的蜘蛛网，乌鸦随之扑翅飞开。

sentences.english: She fidgeted in her chair as she took a deep, tremulous breath.
sentences.chinese: 她在椅子上坐立不安，轻颤着深吸了一口气。

sentences.english: Only in the respiratory status of life between the breath does not come, things go much to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 况人生只在呼吸之间，一口气不来，下去便很苦了。

sentences.english: I feel sick of somebodys who always with their tongue in their cheek.
sentences.chinese: 她让我恶心，说话口气总是很假。

sentences.english: The tone fo apology indicated her sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 她道歉的口气表明了她的诚心。

sentences.english: Then she gave a deep sight and snuggled into my arms.
sentences.chinese: 接着她深深叹口气，紧紧的偎依在我的怀抱里。
